trans-unit.source: Used to enable deferred loading of individual properties (similar to <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntityRef`1"></xref>).

If you assign a deferred source (<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>) to <xref:System.Data.Linq.Link%601>, <xref:System.Data.Linq.Link%601> loads the value by enumerating the source the first time the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Link%601.Value%2A> property is accessed.
The type of the elements in the deferred source.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> structure by referencing the source.
Use this constructor to initialize the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Link%601> with a deferred value loader (implements <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>)
The source collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> structure by copying the internal state from another <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> instance from which to copy.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> structure by referencing the value of the property.
Use this constructor when the value for the property is already known.
The value for the property.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> has loaded or assigned a value.
"Loaded" means that the data was loaded during materialization or at deferred loading.
"Assigned" means that you have manually given the data a value.
[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] uses this property to make sure that the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Link%601> has a value, so that accesing it will not trigger deferred loading.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref> has either loaded or assigned a value; otherwise `false`.
Gets a value that specifies whether the source has a value.
Returns `true` if the source has an assigned or loaded value (including null).
Gets or sets the value assigned to or loaded by the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.Link`1"></xref>.
The value of this deferred property.
